text: Lindsey Vonn Wins Bronze Medal In Downhill At Pyeongchang Winter Olympics Enlarge this image toggle caption Tom Pennington / Getty Images Tom Pennington / Getty Images U. S. skiing star Lindsey Vonn turned in a time that was a half - second off the lead in the downhill Wednesday in South Korea, fast enough to win a medal in her final downhill race of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics â€“ and almost certainly the last of her Olympic career. It's the third Olympic medal overall for Vonn. ` ` It was tough to contemplate this being my last Olympic downhill,'' Vonn said afterward. ` ` I struggled to try to keep the emotions together, but I left it all on the mountain like I said I would.'' ` ` I gave it
